  proposition: Rouzbeh Behnia, Mohammadreza Reza Ebrahimi, Jason Pacheco, and Balaji Padmanabhan proposed EW-Tune framework for privately fine-tuning large language models with differential privacy.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    EW-Tune|DESCRIBED_BY|framework for privately fine-tuning large language models
    EW-Tune|USES|differential privacy

    entity-entity relationships:
    Rouzbeh Behnia|PROPOSED|EW-Tune
    Mohammadreza Reza Ebrahimi|PROPOSED|EW-Tune
    Jason Pacheco|PROPOSED|EW-Tune
    Balaji Padmanabhan|PROPOSED|EW-Tune

  proposition: Sara Montagna, Stefano Ferretti, Lorenz Cuno Klopfenstein, Antonio Florio, and Martino Francesco Pengo explored data decentralisation of LLM-based chatbot systems in chronic disease self-management.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    LLM-based chatbot systems|APPLIED_TO|chronic disease self-management

    entity-entity relationships:
    Sara Montagna|EXPLORED|data decentralisation
    Stefano Ferretti|EXPLORED|data decentralisation
    Lorenz Cuno Klopfenstein|EXPLORED|data decentralisation
    Antonio Florio|EXPLORED|data decentralisation
    Martino Francesco Pengo|EXPLORED|data decentralisation

  proposition: Chaochao Chen, Xiaohua Feng, Jun Zhou, Jianwei Yin, and Xiaolin Zheng published a position paper on federated large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Federated large language models|DESCRIBED_BY|position paper

  proposition: Siwon Kim, Sangdoo Yun, Hwaran Lee, Martin Gubri, Sungroh Yoon, and Seong Joon Oh investigated privacy leakage in large language models through Propile.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Large language models|SUBJECT_OF|privacy leakage

    entity-entity relationships:
    Siwon Kim|INVESTIGATED|privacy leakage

    Seong Joon Oh|INVESTIGATED|privacy leakage
    Propile|USED_FOR|investigating privacy leakage

  proposition: Saiteja Utpala, Sara Hooker, and Pin Yu Chen developed locally differentially private document generation using zero-shot prompting.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Document generation|USES|locally differential privacy
    Document generation|USES|zero-shot prompting

    entity-entity relationships:
    Saiteja Utpala|DEVELOPED|document generation
    Sara Hooker|DEVELOPED|document generation
    Pin Yu Chen|DEVELOPED|document generation

  proposition: Chen Qu, Weize Kong, Liu Yang, Mingyang Zhang, Michael Bendersky, and Marc Najork researched natural language understanding with privacy-preserving BERT.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Natural language understanding|USES|privacy-preserving BERT

  proposition: Jie Huang, Hanyin Shao, and Kevin Chen-Chuan Chang examined whether large pre-trained language models are leaking personal information.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Large pre-trained language models|POTENTIAL_ISSUE|leaking personal information

    entity-entity relationships:
    Jie Huang|EXAMINED|large pre-trained language models
    Hanyin Shao|EXAMINED|large pre-trained language models
    Kevin Chen-Chuan Chang|EXAMINED|large pre-trained language models

  proposition: Timour Igamberdiev and Ivan Habernal proposed DP-BART for privatized text rewriting under local differential privacy.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    DP-BART|USES|local differential privacy
    DP-BART|DESCRIBED_BY|privatized text rewriting

    entity-entity relationships:
    Timour Igamberdiev|PROPOSED|DP-BART
    Ivan Habernal|PROPOSED|DP-BART

  proposition: Nicholas Carlini and colleagues studied extracting training data from large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Large language models|SUBJECT_OF|training data extraction

    entity-entity relationships:
    Nicholas Carlini|STUDIED|training data extraction

  proposition: R. Shokri and researchers investigated membership inference attacks against machine learning models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Machine learning models|SUBJECT_OF|membership inference attacks

    entity-entity relationships:
    R. Shokri|INVESTIGATED|membership inference attacks

  proposition: Congzheng Song and Ananth Raghunathan explored information leakage in embedding models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Embedding models|SUBJECT_OF|information leakage

    entity-entity relationships:
    Congzheng Song|EXPLORED|information leakage
    Ananth Raghunathan|EXPLORED|information leakage

  proposition: Haoran Li and colleagues analyzed multi-step jailbreaking privacy attacks on ChatGPT.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    ChatGPT|SUBJECT_OF|multi-step jailbreaking privacy attacks

    entity-entity relationships:
    Haoran Li|ANALYZED|multi-step jailbreaking privacy attacks

  proposition: Sunder Ali Khowaja, Parus Khuwaja, and Kapal Dev proposed SPADE evaluation framework for ChatGPT, focusing on sustainability, privacy, digital divide, and ethics.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    SPADE|DESCRIBED_BY|evaluation framework
    SPADE|FOCUSES_ON|sustainability
    SPADE|FOCUSES_ON|privacy
    SPADE|FOCUSES_ON|digital divide
    SPADE|FOCUSES_ON|ethics

    entity-entity relationships:
    Sunder Ali Khowaja|PROPOSED|SPADE
    Parus Khuwaja|PROPOSED|SPADE
    Kapal Dev|PROPOSED|SPADE
    SPADE|EVALUATES|ChatGPT

  proposition: Badhan Chandra Das, M. Hadi Amini, and Yanzhao Wu conducted a comprehensive survey on security and privacy challenges of large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Large language models|SUBJECT_OF|security and privacy challenges

    entity-entity relationships:
    Badhan Chandra Das|CONDUCTED|comprehensive survey
